
General project directories: doc; jars, ext, lib
Specific project directories: <project>[i]

doc:

general documentation

libraries:

jars -- holds all external jars, complete with version info in names (not to be directly included in any classpath)
ext -- holds all relevant runtime jars as (versionless) symbolic links to 'jars'
lib -- holds all relevant project (dist) jars

==============================================================================

Projects

<project>
  - build.xml  (ant build script)
  - doc  (project documentation)
  - conf  (project configuration)
  - resources  (project resources)
  - lib  (versionless symbolic links to dependent runtime jars)
    - build-only (versionless symbolic links to build/test-only jars)
  - src
    - java  (java source code)
      - org
        - sd
          - ...
    - test  (testing code)
      - unit  (unit tests)
        - org
          - sd
            - ...
      - integration  (integration tests)
        - org
          - sd
            - ...
      - regression  (regression tests)
        - org
          - sd
            - ...
  - target  (compiled output)
    - dist  (container for distribution jar(s))
    - classes  (compiled classes)
      - org
        - sd
          - ...
    - doc (api/javadocs)
      - index.html
      - org
        - sd
          - ...
    - reports (testing results)
      - html
        - org
          - sd
            - ...
